ygData.subject: The Wolf Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: Needing a beast mode before he could go out, Blackknight went to the CR chambers. He hoped the DNA scanner was still active. Blackknight: Now let s see...

Needing a beast mode before he could go out, Blackknight went to the 
CR chambers. He hoped the DNA scanner was still active.

Blackknight: Now let's see... Scrap... just as I thought... it's 
offline. Let's see what the databank has to offer.

He looked in the Terran DNA files and found a form he liked 
particularly.

Blackknight: This one is great! I'll load it in the replicator right 
away!

He entered the CR, stayed there for a moment, and came out in his 
beast mode... a huge black wolf.

Blackknight: Wow! From now on, my name will be Blackfang! Blackfang, 
maximize!

He transformed to bot mode. His halberd, made from his wolf tail, and 
his energy shotgun stood on his back, his pulse laser was in its 
holster and his bone knife was in a compartment on his left shoulder. 
Furry patches covered his body and a wolf head stood on his right 
shoulder.

Blackfang: Great! I can't wait to fight a predacon like this! (He 
touched his temple, thus opening a general maximal line) Maximals, 
from now on, my name will be Blackfang. Does anyone need my help?
